mapper.select: select Id, OrderId, OrderName, OrderDate, HopeEndDate, FinishedDate, CustomerId, SampleName, Contactor, CheckRequire, Amt, InAmt, InStatus, InvoiceStatus, Status, InvoiceId, ProcRecord, Remark, EdtByUserId, EdtTime, ApplyOrderId, ChargeMan, TelNo, OrderMan, Checkers, InRemark, InvoiceRemark, InDate, InRecorder, InvoiceDate, InvoiceRecorder from hiquality.hqt_customerorder where Id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into hiquality.hqt_customerorder(Id, OrderId, OrderName, OrderDate, HopeEndDate, FinishedDate, CustomerId, SampleName, Contactor, CheckRequire, Amt, InAmt, InStatus, InvoiceStatus, Status, InvoiceId, ProcRecord, Remark, EdtByUserId, EdtTime, ApplyOrderId, ChargeMan, TelNo, OrderMan, Checkers, InRemark, InvoiceRemark, InDate, InRecorder, InvoiceDate, InvoiceRecorder) values (#{id}, #{orderid}, #{ordername}, #{orderdate}, #{hopeenddate}, #{finisheddate}, #{customerid}, #{samplename}, #{contactor}, #{checkrequire}, #{amt}, #{inamt}, #{instatus}, #{invoicestatus}, #{status}, #{invoiceid}, #{procrecord}, #{remark}, #{edtbyuserid}, #{edttime}, #{applyorderid}, #{chargeman}, #{telno}, #{orderman}, #{checkers}, #{inremark}, #{invoiceremark}, #{indate}, #{inrecorder}, #{invoicedate}, #{invoicerecorder})

insert into hiquality.hqt_customerorder(Id, OrderId, OrderName, OrderDate, HopeEndDate, FinishedDate, CustomerId, SampleName, Contactor, CheckRequire, Amt, InAmt, InStatus, InvoiceStatus, Status, InvoiceId, ProcRecord, Remark, EdtByUserId, EdtTime, ApplyOrderId, ChargeMan, TelNo, OrderMan, Checkers, InRemark, InvoiceRemark, InDate, InRecorder, InvoiceDate, InvoiceRecorder) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.orderid}, #{entity.ordername}, #{entity.orderdate}, #{entity.hopeenddate}, #{entity.finisheddate}, #{entity.customerid}, #{entity.samplename}, #{entity.contactor}, #{entity.checkrequire}, #{entity.amt}, #{entity.inamt}, #{entity.instatus}, #{entity.invoicestatus}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.invoiceid}, #{entity.procrecord}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.edtbyuserid}, #{entity.edttime}, #{entity.applyorderid}, #{entity.chargeman}, #{entity.telno}, #{entity.orderman}, #{entity.checkers}, #{entity.inremark}, #{entity.invoiceremark}, #{entity.indate}, #{entity.inrecorder}, #{entity.invoicedate}, #{entity.invoicerecorder})

insert into hiquality.hqt_customerorder(Id, OrderId, OrderName, OrderDate, HopeEndDate, FinishedDate, CustomerId, SampleName, Contactor, CheckRequire, Amt, InAmt, InStatus, InvoiceStatus, Status, InvoiceId, ProcRecord, Remark, EdtByUserId, EdtTime, ApplyOrderId, ChargeMan, TelNo, OrderMan, Checkers, InRemark, InvoiceRemark, InDate, InRecorder, InvoiceDate, InvoiceRecorder) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.orderid}, #{entity.ordername}, #{entity.orderdate}, #{entity.hopeenddate}, #{entity.finisheddate}, #{entity.customerid}, #{entity.samplename}, #{entity.contactor}, #{entity.checkrequire}, #{entity.amt}, #{entity.inamt}, #{entity.instatus}, #{entity.invoicestatus}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.invoiceid}, #{entity.procrecord}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.edtbyuserid}, #{entity.edttime}, #{entity.applyorderid}, #{entity.chargeman}, #{entity.telno}, #{entity.orderman}, #{entity.checkers}, #{entity.inremark}, #{entity.invoiceremark}, #{entity.indate}, #{entity.inrecorder}, #{entity.invoicedate}, #{entity.invoicerecorder})
on duplicate key update Id = values(Id) , OrderId = values(OrderId) , OrderName = values(OrderName) , OrderDate = values(OrderDate) , HopeEndDate = values(HopeEndDate) , FinishedDate = values(FinishedDate) , CustomerId = values(CustomerId) , SampleName = values(SampleName) , Contactor = values(Contactor) , CheckRequire = values(CheckRequire) , Amt = values(Amt) , InAmt = values(InAmt) , InStatus = values(InStatus) , InvoiceStatus = values(InvoiceStatus) , Status = values(Status) , InvoiceId = values(InvoiceId) , ProcRecord = values(ProcRecord) , Remark = values(Remark) , EdtByUserId = values(EdtByUserId) , EdtTime = values(EdtTime) , ApplyOrderId = values(ApplyOrderId) , ChargeMan = values(ChargeMan) , TelNo = values(TelNo) , OrderMan = values(OrderMan) , Checkers = values(Checkers) , InRemark = values(InRemark) , InvoiceRemark = values(InvoiceRemark) , InDate = values(InDate) , InRecorder = values(InRecorder) , InvoiceDate = values(InvoiceDate) , InvoiceRecorder = values(InvoiceRecorder)
